title: A Beautiful Child
description: Describes the life and death of twenty-year-old Tonya Hughes, killed by a hit-and-run driver in 1990 in Oklahoma City, and the discovery that she had been living with her husband--who had been a federal fugitive who had kidnapped her as a toddler--been raised in a world of systematic torture and abuse, and under another identity had struggled to escape the horror of her life.
author: Matt Birkbeck
